title: Login screen failing to open
body:
Hey there folks,
I'm having a bit of trouble and cant quite figure out how to fix it.
Before you ask, i am running it as admin, and I've tried multiple methods of deletion, restarting pc and patching that have all failed to make any headway.

**My problem:**
Whenever i open the patcher, it opens without a hitch, i press launch and... nothing happens.
I've checked whats happening in Task Manager (watched it as i pressed launch) and it appears that the processes related to League are there for a few seconds and then just... vanish.

I'm attempting a repair as i type this out, but thought it was worthwhile going through all avenues before i do a complete reinstall or system recovery or something. The only other thing i can think of is that my Norton Antivirus is being decidedly overzealous, but i haven't had a problem with it until yesterday.

Cheers folks and will update after repair.

Edit: Repair fixed it! #Golden{{item:3157}}

replies.body: Glad the repair fixed you up mate!
Yeah, it was weird that it stopped working, but "if it's fixed, don't f--k with it" is the motto im'a go with
